verses.roman:
miśra sanātane dilā nūtana vasana
vastra nāhi nilā, teṅho kaila nivedana

synonyms: miśra—Tapana Miśra; sanātane—unto Sanātana; dilā—delivered; nūtana vasana—new cloth; vastra—the cloth; nāhi nilā—he did not accept; teṅho—he; kaila—made; nivedana—submission.
translation: When Tapana Miśra offered Sanātana Gosvāmī a new cloth, he did not accept it. Instead, he spoke as follows.
